meanings.definition: Occurring or appearing at regular intervals
meanings.sent1: The sun's periodic rise and set mark the passing of each day.
meanings.sent2: The periodic maintenance of the car ensures its smooth operation.
meanings.sent3: The periodic chirping of the birds outside my window wakes me up every morning.
meanings.sent4: Her periodic laughter filled the room with joy and warmth.
meanings.sent5: The periodic sound of the ticking clock echoed through the empty house.

meanings.definition: Happening or recurring at frequent intervals
meanings.sent1: The periodic rainfall in the rainforest sustains its lush greenery.
meanings.sent2: The periodic meetings with the team help in coordinating our work effectively.
meanings.sent3: His periodic jokes always lighten the mood during tense situations.
meanings.sent4: The periodic waves crashing against the shore create a soothing rhythm.
meanings.sent5: The periodic visits from her grandparents bring smiles to everyone's faces.

meanings.sent1: The periodic nature of the seasons brings about changes in the environment.
meanings.sent2: The periodic fluctuations in stock prices can be unpredictable.
meanings.sent3: The periodic flickering of the faulty light bulb was both annoying and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her periodic mood swings made it challenging to predict her reactions.
meanings.sent5: The periodic blooming of the flowers painted the fields in vibrant colors.
